name: ASL Airlines (Ireland) Limited T/A Air Contractors
about: ASL Airlines Ireland, formerly known as Air Contractors, is a prestigious cargo airline with an extensive operations network across Europe. In partnership with Atlantic Flight Training Academy (AFTA), we offer the ASL Mentored Cadet Programme, providing aspiring pilots with top-tier training and hands-on experience. This programme includes training using ASL’s Standard Operating Procedures, a fully-funded Type Rating, and an industry-competitive salary package. Selected cadets will join one of Europe’s largest cargo operators, ASL Airlines Ireland, which operates a fleet of over 40 aircraft and conducts scheduled freight services for major parcel integrators like Amazon, FedEx, and DHL. Our programme ensures seamless transition into the airline, offering secure employment, diverse career prospects, and a competitive salary. We are committed to delivering world-class pilot training, preparing the next generation of pilots for a successful career in aviation.
